channel.title: Making a new quest for my rsps
channel.description:
Am trying to make a new quest for my server(first quest for me). But when I do I get a bunch of: Cannot find symbol errors. But am using the same symbols as the other quests that have been made. I've been trying to figure this problem out for almost 3 hours now and its almost 1 here and am tired. If you need more info here it is:
Source: Delta Error: [code] client.java:4015: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(q12 == 0){ ^ client.java:4021: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(q12 == 1){ ^ client.java:4027: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(q12 == 15){ ^ client.java:9408: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client q12 = Integer.parseInt(token2); ^ client.java:10355: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(NPCID == 213 && q12 == 0 && q11 == 15 && playerLevel[1] > 75){ ^ client.java:10359: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(q12 == 1 && !playerHasItem(6570)){ ^ client.java:10363: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(q12 == 1 && playerHasItem(6570)){ ^ client.java:10370: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client q12 = 15; ^ client.java:15379: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client q12 = 1; ^ client.java:17076: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client characterfile.write(Integer.toString(q12), 0, Integer.to String(q12).length()); ^ client.java:17076: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client characterfile.write(Integer.toString(q12), 0, Integer.to String(q12).length());
^ textHandler.java:106: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(c.q12 == 0) { ^ textHandler.java:109: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(c.q12 > 0) { ^ textHandler.java:112: cannot find symbol symbol : variable q12 location: class client if(c.q12 == 15){ ^ 14 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
This is my first quest am trying to make..so please no yelling at me if this is simple :rolleyes:
EDIT: Do I have to add the quest name to the texthandler.class? I have looked threw so many files and getting tired..can you tell me what files are required to make the quest(I know client, and textHandler, not sure if there is anymore).
Thanks!

item.title: Making a new quest for my rsps
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

And this belongs in client help?

Read full topic

item.title: Making a new quest for my rsps
item.dc:creator: @xCalvy xCalvy
item.description:
@xCalvy wrote:

Hey, I’m not the best at coding, by why don’t you just try to add ‘NPCs’, like set them out where you want them, and when the players have spoken to them, they get information/objects to assist them through the completion of the quest? easiest way I can think of

Read full topic

item.title: Making a new quest for my rsps
item.dc:creator: @TheSacredKing TheSacredKing
item.description:
@TheSacredKing wrote:

Am trying to make a new quest for my server(first quest for me). But when I do I get a bunch of: Cannot find symbol errors. But am using the same symbols as the other quests that have been made. I’ve been trying to figure this problem out for almost 3 hours now and its almost 1 here and am tired. If you need more info here it is:

Source: Delta
Error:

client.java:4015: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
                if(q12 == 0){
                   ^
client.java:4021: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
                if(q12 == 1){
                   ^
client.java:4027: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
                if(q12 == 15){
                   ^
client.java:9408: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
                                                q12 = Integer.parseInt(token2);
                                                ^
client.java:10355: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
if(NPCID == 213 && q12 == 0 && q11 == 15 && playerLevel[1] > 75){
                   ^
client.java:10359: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
if(q12 == 1 && !playerHasItem(6570)){
   ^
client.java:10363: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
if(q12 == 1 && playerHasItem(6570)){
   ^
client.java:10370: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
                                q12 = 15;
                                ^
client.java:15379: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
                                q12 = 1;
                                ^
client.java:17076: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
                        characterfile.write(Integer.toString(q12), 0, Integer.to
String(q12).length());
                                                             ^
client.java:17076: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
                        characterfile.write(Integer.toString(q12), 0, Integer.to
String(q12).length());

       ^
textHandler.java:106: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
if(c.q12 == 0) {
    ^
textHandler.java:109: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
if(c.q12 > 0) {
    ^
textHandler.java:112: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable q12
location: class client
if(c.q12 == 15){
    ^
14 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

This is my first quest am trying to make…so please no yelling at me if this is simple :rolleyes:

EDIT: Do I have to add the quest name to the texthandler.class? I have looked threw so many files and getting tired…can you tell me what files are required to make the quest(I know client, and textHandler, not sure if there is anymore).

Thanks!
